parameter.name: influxMetricsEnabled
parameter.label: Enabled
parameter.description: Enable the Influx (www.influxdata.com) metrics. Further configuration of the InfluxDB instance is necessary.

parameter.name: influxURL
parameter.label: URL
parameter.description: The URL of the InfluxDB instance. Defaults to http://localhost:8086.

parameter.name: influxDB
parameter.label: Database Name
parameter.description: The name of the database to use. Defaults to "openhab".

parameter.name: influxUpdateIntervalInSeconds
parameter.label: Update Interval in Seconds
parameter.description: Controls how often metrics are exported to InfluxDB (in seconds). Defaults to 300.

parameter.name: jmxMetricsEnabled
parameter.label: Enabled
parameter.description: Enable the Java Management Extensions (JMX) metrics.
